style.name: skin_marks_css
style.css: border-radius:50%;animation:shines 2s ease-in-out infinite, showmarks 0.5s ease-in-out 0.5s forwards;transform:translate3d(0,-3000px,0);background:url(images/hot-icon/marks.svg) no-repeat center center/contain;width:40px;height:50px;

scene.title: 3_1主干道 村委大门口对话
